item.name: 惠特妮•休斯顿 跨世纪精选 终极典藏

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: 惠特妮•休斯顿 跨世纪精选 终极典藏

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: I Will Always Love You、Heartbreak Hotel、Count On Me等35首排行榜金曲与美声天后德博拉·考克斯合唱《Same Script, Different Cast》与拉丁情歌王子艾瑞克深情对唱《Could I Have This Kiss Forever》与英伦流行天王乔治·迈克合唱《If I Told You That》耳熟能详美妙情歌收录到尽

attribute.name: songs
attribute.value: Saving All My Love For You;Greatest Love Of All;One Moment In Time
